```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load useful libraries

```{r libLoad}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```

Read in data from Brook et al. and distill it to host & parasite ID (and group) + record source as "brook"

```{r}
b <- read_csv("data/source/brook_full.csv")
b %<>% select(hHostNameFinal,hOrder,vVirusNameCorrected)
b %<>% mutate(paraType="virus",source="brook")
```

Check overlap with Healy et al. paper

```{r}
h <- read_csv("data/healy_axis_analysis.csv")
b %<>% filter(hHostNameFinal %in% h$species)
```

Write result to a csv file

```{r}
write_csv(b,path="data/brook_subset.csv")
```
